about_the_game:
About This Game

"Jackson's Store" immerses players in a spine-chilling psychological horror experience, where the line between reality and nightmares disappears. Set in an abandoned clothing store cursed by a vengeful spirit, players must survive the haunting darkness and evade relentless mannequins that only move when the lights are out.

As you navigate the eerie aisles, you’ll uncover the tragic story of a tormented tailor whose dark magic has trapped the store in eternal torment. Your mission: solve intricate puzzles, restore power to the building, and escape before becoming the store’s next victim.

With every shadow concealing danger and each step fraught with tension, "Jackson's Store" combines atmospheric storytelling with strategic gameplay to deliver a uniquely terrifying experience. Will you outsmart the relentless mannequins and uncover the store’s secrets, or will you become another lost soul on display?

Key Features

  • Dynamic Light Mechanics: Use light to your advantage to halt the mannequins' movement and navigate safely.

  • Intricate Puzzles: Solve challenging puzzles that reveal the story and unlock pathways to escape.

  • Atmospheric Horror: Immerse yourself in a haunting environment filled with chilling visuals and an eerie soundtrack.

  • Relentless Enemies: Stay one step ahead of mannequins that stalk you in the dark.

  • Rich Narrative: Piece together the tragic backstory of the store and its cursed tailor through environmental storytelling and collectibles.

  • High Replayability: Multiple endings based on your choices and performance.

Are you ready to face the terror that lurks in the shadows of "Jackson's Store"?

name: Jackson's Store

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit/32 bit) or Newer
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit/32 bit) or Newer
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual core or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Escape a haunted clothing store filled with possessed mannequins that stalk you in the dark. Use light, stealth, and quick thinking to survive this tense and atmospheric horror experience.
